sentences.en: Hard wind and bitter cold wizen his face.
sentences.cn: 强风与酷寒使他的脸孔皱缩了。

sentences.en: Hard wind and bitter cold wizen his face.
sentences.cn: 强风与酷寒使他的脸孔皱缩了.

sentences.en: There would be a day when our faces would be wrinkled and wizen .
sentences.cn: 总有一天，我们的脸会布满皱纹而且变得皱缩的。

sentences.en: There would be a day when our faces would be wrinkled and wizen.
sentences.cn: 总有一天,我们的脸会布满皱纹而且变得皱缩的.

sentences.en: You Have to admit that it is a garden, Even if walking on the wizen ones, Perhaps you lost all flowers once again, but you still didn't lost whole garden !
sentences.cn: 即使在凋零的花园中散步，也得学著承认她还是一座花园，你也许一次有一次的失去了朵朵鲜花，但你并没有失去整个花园！

words.tran_cn: 枯萎（wizen的过去式和过去分词）
